about_the_game:
About This Game


Take on the role of a Rift Guardian and maintain the balance between dimensions while facing deadly enemies. Grow stronger with each playthrough and prove your worth in this unstable multiverse.

Features


  • Auto-firing skills by default with a manual aiming option
  • Fast runs (starting from 10 minutes)
  • Currently, we have one class, the mage.
  • Dozens of skills and three unique sub-classes for each Guardian, e.g., Mage (Arcane, Fire, Frost).
  • Three permanent talent trees for each Guardian
  • Gather ores and essences to enhance your Guardian permanently
  • Complete missions to advance in the rifts and defeat challenging bosses with unique and permanent rewards
